<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.AsmtMetricsUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>AsmtMetricsUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[var AsmtMetricsUtil = Class.create(); AsmtMetricsUtil.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
hasListNewAccess: function() { return gs.action.getGlideURI().get('sysparm_view') != 'survey' && !gs.action.getGlideURI().get('sysparm_target').includes('sample_metric') && !gs.action.getGlideURI().get('sysparm_target').includes('asmt_metric.depends_on'); }, type: 'AsmtMetricsUtil' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-08-18 18:54:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4d0fd338730023009ecc234ffff6a7d3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AsmtMetricsUtil</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Assessment" source="com.snc.assessment_core">72d00d4b6d2620100acb70b35343300e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4d0fd338730023009ecc234ffff6a7d3</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-08-18 18:57:15</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>398</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
